title: ReverbType
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see

name: ReverbType
type: enum
summary: |
  The ReverbType Enum allows you to make audio in your game sound different,
  depending on what "area" the sounds are in.
description: |
  The ReverbType Enum allows you to make audio in your game sound different,
  depending on what "area" the sounds are in.

  Note that some of these do not appear to have any effect on the sound.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: NoReverb
    summary: |
      No sound reverb. Audio is not changed from default.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: GenericReverb
    summary: |
      Sound reverb is changed to a generic reverb effect.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: PaddedCell
    summary: |
      Sound reverb is changed to sound like the player is in a padded cell.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
